spell_description: Shooting forth from your hands a flame which engulfs the hex before you in roaring flames. When you [Cast]{keyword:spells:cast], designate a [Target Hex]{keyword:spells:target_hex} for the flames to erupt onto. When the spell [Resolves]{keyword:spells:resolve}, each creature must make an [Agility]{keyword:attributes:agility} [Spell Contest]{keyword:spells:spell_contest. Each creature which fails takes 22 + twice your [Might]{keyword:attributes:might} [Magical]{keyword:damage:magical} (fire) damage. Each successful creature takes 22 [Magical]{keyword:damage:magical} (fire) damage instead.
